name.ja: <ruby>ＯＴＳ<rt>アウターバース</rt></ruby>リバース・ドメイン

requirement.en: Activate this card if you have 5 or more "OuTerverSe" with different Types in your Graveyard.

effect.en: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up non-LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type monsters on your field gain 1500 ATK during your turn, and if you have face-up monsters on your field with 3 different Types, those monsters cannot be destroyed by card effects during your opponent's turn.
